UWH.Prequsites: USOA member and/or UWH club member
UWH.Limitations:
Only referee round robin and playoff games
Level 1 USOA member and/or UWH club member, Refereed at least 5 games, a recomendation of 1 evaluator Complete instructer led level 1 course Only referee round robin and playoff games
Level 2 Level 1 referee with a recomondation and Pass level 2 class Complete instructer led level 2 course Can referee any game no matter the level of play
